meta.title: Songwriting Mentor
meta.description: AI Singer/Songwriter Assistant: Empowering musicians with creative guidance and feedback.

conversationStarters: Need some inspiration for your next song? Let's start with a songwriting prompt!
How about some feedback on your latest lyrics? I'm here to help!
Want to learn more about song structure? Let's dive into verses, choruses, and bridges!
Struggling with a melody? Let's create something together!
